trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice>" name="<saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> element within a SAML assertion that contains additional information provided by the SAML authority.
The `<saml:Advice>` element within a SAML assertion is an extension point for SAML tokens.
One example of how to use the SamlAdvice class is to provide supporting information about the SAML authority issuing the SAML assertion.

This supporting information can be in the form of a SAML assertion or a reference to a SAML assertion, which are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> properties, respectively.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"></xref> class.

When this constructor is called and the instance is not modified prior to serializing it into XML by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> method, an empty `<saml:Advice>` element is generated by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> method.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"></xref> class using the specified collection of SAML assertions.
The elements of the `assertions` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> property.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains SAML assertions that provides additional information for a SAML assertion.
assertions contains a element.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"></xref> class.
The elements of the `references` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.
references contains a element.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"></xref> class using the specified collections of SAML assertions and SAML assertion references.
The elements of the `references` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property.
The elements of the `assertions` parameter are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> property.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains SAML assertions that provide additional information for a SAML assertion.
references contains a element.
-or- assertions contains a element.
Gets a collection of references to SAML assertions.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.
Gets a collection of SAML assertions.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains SAML assertions that provides additional information for a SAML assertion.
Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Causes this instance to be read-only.
When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`.
Reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice>" name="<saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> XML element using the specified XML reader.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice>" name="<saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> XML element.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML assertion that are defined in the SAML specification.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that can read a <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause.

A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature for SAML assertions that contain this <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice>" name="<saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> XML element.
reader is -or- samlSerializer is

The <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice> " name="<saml:Advice> " href=""></xref>element does not conform to the XML schema for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice>" name="<saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> element.
Writes this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice"></xref> into the specified XML writer as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice>" name="<saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> element.
A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice>" name="<saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> element.

A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice>" name="<saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> element and its child elements and attributes that are defined in the SAML specification.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
writer is -or- samlSerializer is
